001package edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.service;
002
003import androidx.lifecycle.LiveData;
004import dagger.hilt.android.qualifiers.ApplicationContext;
005import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.dao.GameResultDao;
006import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.GameResult;
007import edu.cnm.deepdive.teamle.model.entity.User;
008import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Completable;
009import io.reactivex.rxjava3.core.Single;
010import io.reactivex.rxjava3.schedulers.Schedulers;
011import java.util.List;
012import javax.inject.Inject;
013
014public class GameResultRepository {
015
016  private final GameResultDao gameResultDao;
017
018  @Inject
019  public GameResultRepository(GameResultDao gameResultDao) {
020    this.gameResultDao = gameResultDao;
021  }
022
023  public Single<GameResult> add(GameResult gameResult) {
024    return gameResultDao
025        .insertAndUpdate(gameResult)
026        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.single());
027  }
028
029  public LiveData<List<GameResult>> getAll(int correctTeam, User user) {
030    return (user !=null)
031        ? gameResultDao.getRankedResults(correctTeam, user.getId())
032        : gameResultDao.getRankedResults(correctTeam);
033  }
034
035  public Completable clear() {
036    return gameResultDao
037        .truncateResults()
038        .subscribeOn(Schedulers.io());
039  }
040
041}
